title: ACCOUNT BLOCK AND RANK FRAME AWAY
body:
Dear LOL Staff:
I accept block of my account in EUW for that period of time i afk 1 time on aram (and block account for 10+day i dont know why)
but i need to know why im platinum frame go away for this suspended?
PLS let me know this is my problem or problem of system
:)
waiting for ur reply

replies.body:
Send a ticket to support, dude.

The link is over there.

where i need to sent?
and what is ticket

look on top of the page

"support"-->send ticket

remember that you are in the italian forum XD
